timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Hand ball by Makoto Hasebe (Japan).
Attempt missed. Yoshito Okubo (Japan) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Keisuke Honda.

timelineItems.name: FiT News
timelineItems.text: With #COL resting some key players, including Rodriguez, there's a chance for others to impress. Martinez in particular should be a threat.

timelineItems.text: That Colombia team is not weak. Quintero, Martinez, Ramos coming in shows huge strength in depth. Balanta at CB also a huge prospect. #COL

timelineItems.text: How about some cruel luck for #BRA & the rest of S. America: Assuming #COL wins, 4 of the 5 SA teams are in the same corner of the bracket.

timelineItems.name: Juan Sandoval
timelineItems.text: I love this line up, giving the back up players a chance to show what they can do #COL
